    • Method Detail

      • activate

        public boolean activate(Object e,
                        Map<String,Object> scriptVars)
        This should be called at least once on start up so variables can be initialized.
        Overrides:
        activate in class AbstractTriggerManager.Trigger
        Parameters:
        e - the Event associated with this Trigger
        scriptVars - the temporary local variables
        Returns:
        true if activated; false if on cooldown

      • checkCooldown

        protected boolean checkCooldown(Object e)
        We don't use cooldown for this trigger. Just return false always
        Overrides:
        checkCooldown in class AbstractTriggerManager.Trigger
        Returns:
        true if cooldown; false if not cooldown or 'e' is not a compatible type
